title: Franchise Hockey Manager 2.x.x Patch - SoN
description:
Game: Franchise Hockey Manager
Version: 2.x.x 
Coded: November 10, 2015 by gone of SoN
Type: Patch

Description:  FHM 2 features a robust set of new features and system, as most everything in the game has been rewritten and redeveloped from the game's predecessor. This is the deepest, most immersive, and most customizable hockey management game in the world. It's the closest you can get to being a professional hockey coach or general manager. Choose one of 21 leagues from around the world and select a team to guide to glory. Or, create your own fictional setup from one of 34 templates. In FHM 2 you are in charge of signing free agents, making big trades or waiver wire pickups, drafting the next crop of superstars, setting your lines and in-game tactics and much more. The game engine and many of the core systems have been completely overhauled from the first iteration to create an amazingly in-depth and immersive hockey experience.

Instructions: This is just a basic patch. Install FHM 2 as normal. Open the patch. Click the "Browse For Exe" button and select fhm2.exe from the installation folder. Tick the "Make Backup" box if you want to make a backup of the original exe. Click the "Crack Game" button. That is it. Enjoy!

Notes: Glycolosis doesn't ever stop but it can slow down
